about_the_game:
**Welcome to Pixel Princess Arena**

Pixel Princess Arena is a game that invites you to embark on an adventure at your own pace. Take control of your heroes, strategically place them on the battlefield, and reshape your tactics as often as you desire. Should you encounter defeat, fear not—try the battle anew and emerge victorious.

Key Features


  • Leveling Up Heroes: Combine 3 identical heroes to level them up and unlock an array of skills.
  • Unique Items: Each item possesses distinctive abilities that, when equipped by heroes, grant them newfound power.
  • Powerful Blessings: Teams can harness up to 3 Blessings, bestowing formidable bonuses upon them.
  • Mysterious Encounters: Forge your own path as you chart your course. Take the riskier route for greater rewards or tread the safer path to steady progress.
  • Special Maps: Utilize the unique tile effects present in each map to secure victory in battle.

name: Pixel Princess Arena

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTS 450 / AMD Radeon HD 5570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 - i7 Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 750Ti / AMD Radeon R9 270x
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device

short_description: Pixel Princess Arena is a Single Player Auto Battler. Strategically place your heroes, empower them with unique items and blessings, build your team, and save the princess!
